column4: having network trouble here.   ubuntu 10.4 static ip in the 192.168 range     but cant ping my own ip
can't ping my own ip from the ip i'm pinging    and iptables -L  says no firewall issue
my netgear won't let me do it either.
?    how can a router block communication within a box ?     there is no hardware between computer and itself
my bad... didn't catch the range...
on the box in question   yes
right-click on network-applet and select Connection Settings... what is the ip?
